channel.title: Attention to the Newcomers
channel.description:
If you havn't noticed there's been a recent increase of these fake/crappy un-edited servers. That's nice and all, but keep them to yourself. I will from now on (when I am actually online) purposely be fucking with these servers until they are taken down or actually worked on. IMO, it's not fair that people are being taken from actual good servers to these failures.
On that note, if you truly do want to learn, I suggest you get your shit straight and actually take the time to learn instead of posting up bullshit. I am only doing this to save what is left of ACTUAL development.
Rant/Hate/Call me a loser/nerd/asshole. I don't really care, its time to take swift action.

item.title: Attention to the Newcomers
item.dc:creator: @i_pk_pjers_i i_pk_pjers_i
item.description:
@i_pk_pjers_i wrote:

[quote=“KO9, post:13, topic:226561”][quote author=Jaghetermario link=topic=297716.msg2394519#msg2394519 date=1219096555]
I have edit crewpk from start to stop i have removed all npc/monsters/shops we have made new comands a new base! so wtf is your problem if you want ppl to get higher security thenb just make a fu guide cuz everyone arant computer nerds as you!
[/quote]

TBH, If you don’t know about computers you shouldn’t be hosting a server which requires computer knowledge… I read in another post that your database got deleted, if you had computer knowledge you’d have done backups and had better security.[/quote]He did do backups but he says whenever something like that happens he starts over from scratch, even if he had like 100 people playing the server and everyone loved it and it got hacked, he would start over from scratch and delete everything. Kinda a bit retarded imo.

Read full topic

item.title: Attention to the Newcomers
item.dc:creator: @KO9 KO9
item.description:
@KO9 wrote:

Jaghetermario:

I have edit crewpk from start to stop i have removed all npc/monsters/shops we have made new comands a new base! so wtf is your problem if you want ppl to get higher security thenb just make a fu guide cuz everyone arant computer nerds as you!

TBH, If you don’t know about computers you shouldn’t be hosting a server which requires computer knowledge… I read in another post that your database got deleted, if you had computer knowledge you’d have done backups and had better security.

Read full topic
